{"id":803367153,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"11 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1663559642,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"343 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/803367153/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"14.4 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def maxAreaOfIsland(self, grid: List[List[int]]) -> int:\n        m, n = len(grid), len(grid[0])\n        visited = set()\n        max_area = 0\n        for i in range(m):\n            for j in range(n):\n                if grid[i][j] == 1 and (i, j) not in visited:\n                    curr_area = 0\n                    stack = [(i, j)]\n                    visited.add((i, j))\n                    while stack:\n                        r, c = stack.pop()\n                        curr_area += 1\n                        for nr, nc in ((r - 1, c), (r + 1, c), (r, c - 1), (r, c + 1)):\n                            if 0 <= nr < m and 0 <= nc < n \\\n                            and grid[nr][nc] == 1 \\\n                            and (nr, nc) not in visited:\n                                stack.append((nr, nc))\n                                visited.add((nr, nc))\n                    max_area = max(max_area, curr_area)\n        return max_area","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
